name: Xihui Liu
department: Department of Electrical and Electronic Engineering and Institute of Data Science
research: My research interests cover computer vision, deep learning, and artificial intelligence, with special emphasis on generative AI, multimodal AI, and embodied AI.
prospective_students: I am actively looking for self-motivated Ph.D. students, postdoctoral scholars, research assistants, and visiting students to join my group. Eligible students can apply for Hong Kong PhD Fellowship Scheme (HKPFS) and HKU Presidential PhD Scholar Programme (HKU-PS). Postgraduate scholarships (PGS) are granted to other students without HKPFS and HKU-PS.
